title: PANTSpod: Teaser
itunes:title: PANTSpod: Teaser
itunes:subtitle: PANTS - your favourite new podcast.Brought to you by Kate Moennig and Leisha Hailey.Kate and Leisha play best friends on TV and in real life. Every week, these two gay BFF’S, and the occasional guest, answer a fan question and dig deep for the answer...
description:
PANTS - your favourite new podcast.

Brought to you by Kate Moennig and Leisha Hailey.

Kate and Leisha play best friends on TV and in real life. Every week, these two gay BFF’S, and the occasional guest, answer a fan question and dig deep for the answer. With opposing views often leading to oversharing and unqualified advice, anything is open for discussion. They debate everything from home projects, sex, gay life, secrets and money to fears, sports, pets and work. Listen in on this friendship called PANTS, because you can’t have one leg without the other.



Produced in the UK by Rachel Shelley. 

Follow us on Twitter @ThePantsPod

Email us a question pantspodcast@yahoo.com


See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
